documents.document: I wonder who has walked the farthest @DerekTheWeather or @JuliaBradbury ? New show idea - Great British Walk Off?
@BBCRadio4Extra brilliant binaural! The Revenge. A play with no dialogue
Thank goodness it's friday 🍷
@Nevardmedia Wear the Fox hat...? (Said in an Irish accent)
@TWPILOT1 fab! It's OO. Trundling along my 4 ft long by 6 inch wide shunty plank.
@MrTimDunn Surrey built for mine! AC Cars who also built the Cobra and those blue 3 wheel invalid carriages
@MrTimDunn Yours is a whopper! With buffers on. Park Royal?
An AC railbus on a branch line. Somewhere. In 1958. #cornwall maybe. https://t.co/pMHmFkD0gq
@InglenookR same AC Cars also built the Cobra sports car and those three wheel invalid carriages.
@InglenookR #railway #rail #bus #trundle along! https://t.co/PNVS6OK9VM
@thepostalmuseum East Morsey?
@thepostalmuseum the Rev S Reynolds The Vicarage, Hampton Court?
AC Cars built these to trundle branch lines in 1958. First passenger stock I've ever bought! #heljan https://t.co/ZEaguxSaVL
@modelrailwayeng I've got quite a few back issues if you are missing any/interested?
Great article in @Min_Rail_Mag about the @RHDR
@AntCoulls @railwaymuseum looks just like a refurbished @ArrivaTW pacer. Bet there's no WiFi too!
@ILovesTheDiff do you know why..?

A pair of #flyingscotsman in O gauge. Liking the 3 rail #hornby tin plate best! https://t.co/Mgc9MVHFem
@thepostalmuseum the proposed extentions were vast.
And for 50p a #book about @thepostalmuseum post office railway. https://t.co/QfrpAykpQI
At a Bristol #train #show and there is broad gauge.. lovely broad gauge https://t.co/eHMg9hyoHn
Thanks @WellfieldBooks1 for my @bathales pint of Darkside accompanyment. A fine stout. A fine read. https://t.co/A1TImzU8tc
@InglenookR #ogauge #railways #bristol
Tomorrow is BOGG 2017. Bristol O Gauge Group at the University of West of England. 30 lovely big train sets + trade stands. And bacon rolls.
"People tired of old & cramped @ArrivaTW trains, say MPs" as they jump on the #bandwagon , desperate for your vote..

Started watching #delicious - was ok. Now it's rather shite.
They did vote for Regan the actor and Bush jnr (twice) the Clown...
A new dick tater

@MrTimDunn you are soooo posh! We had an Allegro estate in poo colour brown !

@TheGIDC just about go for oliver. Not keen on either dining room.
@TheGIDC @kellyhoppen @Danielhopwood is after something naughty again!

@TheGIDC it's #TeamOliver for us.
@TheGIDC @Danielhopwood Grubby knees! Hope the stains came out!
@AntCoulls @steam_museum @DrOliBetts @GallipoliGunner @everythingGWR Look out for The Gluepot pub. Fine pint & railway bits on the walls.
I am in a #pub & it has an #inglenook . I am sitting in the Inglenook and it needs a model #railway ...

@ILovesTheDiff yes, shame that traffic wardens can't be arsed to drag themselves away from the easy pickings by city hall.. @cardiffcouncil
@dragonborn2112 @DerekTheWeather cancel all flights and train travel!
@TheGIDC as long as Jo the decorater is on your team you can't fail! #gojo she's awesome!
@TheGIDC I've had my briefs since Christmas
@InglenookR please stop tweeting the word #snow ! Everyone #panic #emptyshelves #wtf #cancelledflights #notrains #DOOMSDAY # # #
@InglenookR #pathetic #Gritting #dontpanic #CarryOn #hashtag et cetera
The UK grinds slowly to a halt in panic mode as the word #snow is mentioned..
